Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The naga remnants are guarding the gallery on the third level of the temple.

Kill {@LinkCreature:42#210#dagonite crusaders}, {@LinkCreature:42#310#naga tridentars}, {@LinkCreature:42#330#naga guardians}, {@LinkCreature:42#900#mekonari shamans}, {@LinkCreature:42#910#mekonari witches}, and {@LinkCreature:42#1000#mekonari sentinels}.

Report to Coordinator Glasrinne when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
